subject: Re: Re: Order #SSN1650 confirmed
description_text:

stock throttle spring too soft

conversations.body_text: Hi Basher Skinz,  You can use the clutch springs included in the package. Blue and red springs are provided, and you’re free to mix and match them as needed.
Even though I only ordered the 2 pedal set?

Hi Basher Skinz,  ​We’ll send you three springs as a gift: yellow, blue, and red. Also, could you please share the link where it mentions that our spring is “too soft”? We'd like to review the customer feedback and make improvements.

Hi,
I mean in general, every pedal set i have had (simagic, sprints, fanatec
etc) the throttle spring was too soft, I really appreciate you including a
stiffer spring :)

On Thu, 5 Jun 2025 at 05:20, service@simsonn.com
你好，Basher Skinz，  我已经将您关于油门过软的反馈转达给了我们的研发团队。他们会评估是否需要增加更硬的油门弹簧。

Hi
It is only my preference for a firmer spring, other people might be happier
with a softer one

On Fri, 6 Jun 2025 at 04:44, service@simsonn.com

Hi
I ordered with the haptics but they did not come, are they being shipped
separately?

Best regards
Dave

Hi Basher Skinz, The shipment of the VAM Pro motor was delayed due to a holdup with the motor housing. The housings have arrived today, and we will be shipping your order between June 16th and 18th. Thank you for your understanding and support!
